{grouping=~"kubernetes.${namespace}.${workload}"} | pattern "<raw>" | json | line_format "{{ $structural_message := index (fromJson $.raw) \"structural_message\" }}{{ if $structural_message }}{{ range $k, $v := $structural_message }}\033[1;33m{{ $k }}\033[0m={{ $v }}\n{{ end }}{{ else }}{{ $.message }}{{ end }}"
